results.title: Long-term (2-4 year) weight reduction with metformin plus carbohydrate-modified diet in euglycemic, hyperinsulinemic, midlife women (Syndrome W).
results.text_hl: Long-term (2-4 year) @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight reduction@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@-modified diet in euglycemic, @DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@, midlife @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Pallister_W_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538106 @@@Syndrome W@@@).

citations.NLM: Mogul HR, Peterson SJ, Weinstein BI, Li J, Southren AL. Long-term (2-4 year) weight reduction with metformin plus carbohydrate-modified diet in euglycemic, hyperinsulinemic, midlife women (Syndrome W). Heart Dis. 2003 Nov-Dec;5(6):384-92. PMID: 14633321
